markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Great Tengu Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=1322) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Long-Nosed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=1316)

</column>

---

You take on the imposing form of a large, winged oni. Once per day, as part of using Long-Nosed Form, you also gain the benefits of 4th-level [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) and [_fly_](/Spells.aspx?ID=125). This lasts for 5 minutes or until you shift out of your Long-Nosed Form, whichever happens first.
name: Great Tengu Form
